item.description:
Join us for some beautiful evening by the Charles River of picnicking and listening to Landmark Orchestraâ€™s classical concert series at the Esplanade. No Charge for the concert. We will be sitting in front and center of the Hatchshell and people should arrive 6:45 so that we can settle in and do introductions before the music begins at 7pm. Drizzle cancels. This will be every Wed night until Labor Day, Bring dinner and something to sit on.

Trip Coordinator(TC): Mosaicwalks@yahoo.com
RSVP: No RSVP required. Contact TC's email with any questions. Please give me several days to respond.
MEET: 6:45 front and center of the stage. TC will be wearing a MOSAIC cap. Drizzle cancels.
COST: $5 (will be credited towards your $25 Mosaic of Mass membership if you join)

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: CLASSICAL MUSIC AT THE ESPLANADE SERIES
